articles.content:
NASCAR is well aware of the potential for increased television audiences as it attempts to restart its season.

articles.title: Two Massachusetts golf courses are planning to reopen despite the governor’s COVID-19 orders - Boston.com
articles.description: Massachusetts is one of four states that is still enforcing a statewide ban on golf.
articles.content:
In Massachusetts, golf is still restricted under Gov. Charlie Bakers ban of non-essential businesses that lasts through May 18, but a pair of courses are planning to defy the order.
